Name: Vancouver
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist (or Luxardo Maraschino Cherry ).
Review: This cocktail, which is popular in the city from which it takes its name, was originally made with French dry vermouth but since the turn of the century has been made with Italian sweet vermouth. I've opted for the 'perfect' solution with 50% dry and 50% sweet vermouths.
History: Recipe adapted from the About Town Cocktail Book which featured popular food and drink recipes in Vancouver and was published in 1925 by Mitchell Publishing, a local publishing company.
Nutrition: One serving of Vancouver contains 216 calories
